original_text: He also gave him a copy of the text of the edict for their annihilation, which had been published in Susa, to show to Esther and explain it to her, and he told him to instruct her to go into the king’s presence to beg for mercy and plead with him for her people.
korean_text: 또 유다인을 진멸하라고 수산 궁에서 내린 조서 초본을 하닥에게 주어 에스더에게 보여 알게 하고 또 그에게 부탁하여 왕에게 나아가서 그 앞에서 자기 민족을 위하여 간절히 구하라 하니

sentences.original_text: He also gave him a copy of the text
of the edict for their annihilation
which had been published in Susa
and he told him to instruct her
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그는 그녀에게 명령하도록 그에게 말했다

sentences.original_text: to go into the king's presence
and plead with him for her people
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀의 백성을 위해 그에게 간구하도록
